title: Cannot find @truffle/error when requiring @truffle/contract
body:
## Issue

When installing @truffle/contract, the @truffle/error dependency installed is empty, so requiring @truffle/contract fails with the error:
```
Cannot find module '.../node_modules/@truffle/error/dist/src/index.js'
```

## Steps to Reproduce

- Install via `npm init -y && npm i @truffle/contract` (
- Bring up a console with `node`
- Run `require('@truffle/contract')`

## Actual Results

```
Error: Cannot find module '/home/spalladino/Projects/sdk/truffle/check-error/node_modules/@truffle/error/dist/src/index.js'. Please verify that the package.json has a valid "main" entry
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:72:18)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1025:19)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:878:14)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:985:32)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1157:10)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1137:30)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/home/spalladino/Projects/sdk/truffle/check-error/node_modules/@truffle/contract/lib/statuserror.js:1:22)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:72:18)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1025:19)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:841:27)
    at Function.Module._resolveFilename (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:952:27)
    at Function.Module._findPath (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:682:18)
    at tryPackage (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:321:19) {
  code: 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND',
  path: '/home/spalladino/Projects/sdk/truffle/check-error/node_modules/@truffle/error/package.json',
  requestPath: '@truffle/error'
}
```

## Notes

This could have been caused by [this changeset](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/pull/3239/files#diff-dd4b6d2d8e7b2f2a754559d360072f67), which modified the `package.json` of truffle error a few days ago.

When checking the contents of @truffle/error in the node_modules folder, it seems that there are no sources included:
```
$ ll node_modules/@truffle/error
drwxr-xr-x 2 spalladino spalladino 4096 Aug 17 13:10 ./
drwxr-xr-x 9 spalladino spalladino 4096 Aug 17 13:10 ../
-rw-r--r-- 1 spalladino spalladino 1079 Oct 26  1985 LICENSE
-rw-r--r-- 1 spalladino spalladino 1910 Aug 17 13:10 package.json
-rw-r--r-- 1 spalladino spalladino   79 Oct 26  1985 README.md
```

## Environment

* Operating System: Ubuntu 19.04
* @truffle/contract version: 4.2.18
* @truffle/error version: 0.0.9
* node version (`node --version`): 12.18.3
* npm version (`npm --version`): 6.14.6
Yikes! Will publish fix for this tonight!

This should be fixed in:

 - @truffle/artifactor@4.0.74
 - @truffle/box@2.0.4
 - @truffle/compile-common@0.3.6
 - @truffle/compile-solidity@4.3.19
 - @truffle/compile-vyper@1.0.68
 - @truffle/config@1.2.27
 - @truffle/contract@4.2.19
 - @truffle/core@5.1.41
 - @truffle/debugger@7.5.12
 - @truffle/decoder@4.3.17
 - @truffle/deployer@3.1.35
 - @truffle/environment@0.2.21
 - @truffle/error@0.0.10
 - @truffle/migrate@3.1.35
 - @truffle/provider@0.2.20
 - @truffle/provisioner@0.2.4
 - @truffle/require@2.0.50
 - @truffle/resolver@6.0.15
 - @truffle/workflow-compile@2.1.48
 - truffle@5.1.41

Will re-open if that's not the case! Sorry about this!

Thanks so much for the quick response!!

@anshu-khare-design We prioritize new and open issues during our weekly triage session and don't often look at closed issues. Please open a new issue, so we can get help you resolve it. Thanks!
